prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with vibrant blue feathers and a striking orange beak.
I want a bird-like Pokemon that has a sleek body and a majestic wingspan.
Generate a Pokemon image featuring a large bird with intricate feather patterns in red and white.
Make a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility with a long tail and sharp wings.
Imagine a fierce avian Pokemon soaring through the skies with radiant colors and sharp talons.
Design a majestic Pokemon with a strong presence, showcasing bold color contrasts and detailed wings.
Show me a powerful flying Pokemon with an impressive wingspan and a confident expression.
